alert.note: Alert for Caddo (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 2:56PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Caddo Parish, eastern Marion and southeastern Cass Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 255 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Oil City, or 23 miles southeast of Atlanta, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vivian, Oil City, Rodessa, McLeod, Smithland and Gray. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
